name: linemart
description: LineMart - Cashier and Customer Dashboard Integration

scripts.build: npm install --prefix linemart-frontend && npm run build --prefix linemart-frontend
scripts.start: npm install --prefix linemart-frontend && npm start --prefix linemart-frontend
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix linemart-frontend && npm run build --prefix linemart-frontend

author: LineMart Team
